name: Spotted Garden Eel Adventure
description:
Story

Goh, the main character who can't swim despite being a dingo, was rejected by a girl on a matching app and made fun of by his friends, so he finally decided to take a leap of faith and set out on a journey to learn how to swim.

Genre

It's an orthodox action game with nothing out of the ordinary.
Collect coins and EXP to purchase weapons and unlock skills to enhance the main character!

Stage

Stages is a very common platformer game.
Money is obtained by destroying boxes containing items.
Defeating enemies will drop exp.
These can be used in the briefing scenes that are interspersed between stages.

Story part

Adventure-style skits are interspersed between stages.

Boss Battle

Some stages have a boss at the end.
Clear the stage by eliminating the boss's HP.

Briefing Scene

During the briefing scene, money and exp gained during the stage can be used to purchase weapons and unlock skills to enhance the player.
Weapons include shotguns, homing and piercing bullets, and many others.
Unlocking skills will increase the player's actions, such as being able to jump two bullets, increase HP, etc.
